snippet.title: Lords of Exile - Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
Kickstarter is over, but you can still support the project and get your rewards here:
http://www.squidbitworks.com/

WISHLIST on STEAM: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1329360/Lords_of_Exile/

Lords of Exile is a 8-bit side-scrolling action platformer set in the far Lands of Exilia where a cursed knight makes his way to the revenge. A combination of classic retro mechanics and linear level design in 8-bit graphics!

WEBSITE: http://www.squidbitworks.com/lords-of-exile/
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/CZAzuaga
